edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.input
Class CuratorRecordReader

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader
      edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.hadoopinterface.infrastructure.input.CuratorRecordReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class CuratorRecordReader
extends RecordReader

This class transforms a DirectorySplit into a (Text key, HadoopRecord value) pair (where HadoopRecord is of our own type, denoting a single document in the corpus together with all its annotations).

nextKeyValue

public boolean nextKeyValue()
                     throws IOException,
                            InterruptedException
Checks to see if there is another (key, value) pair to be read; if there is, this method prepares that pair for future access.

Specified by:
nextKeyValue in class RecordReader
Returns:
TRUE if a (key, value) pair was created, and thus if there are further (key, value) pairs to emit. FALSE if all (key, value) pairs from this input split have already been emitted.
Throws:
IOException
InterruptedException
